# Cartogram

Following:

* [https://r-graph-gallery.com/331-basic-cartogram.html](https://r-graph-gallery.com/331-basic-cartogram.html) 
* [https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cartogram/readme/README.html](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cartogram/readme/README.html)

## Call Libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
library(rnaturalearth) # natural earth data

library(ggplot2) # beautiful maps

library(dplyr) # data wrangling

library(sf) # simple (spatial) features

library(cartogram) # cartograms!
```
:::


## Remove Scientific Notation


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
options(scipen = 999) # high 'penalty' for scientific notation
```
:::


## Get Map Data From `rnaturalearth`


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
mapdata <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", # medium scale
                        returnclass = "sf")  # as sf object
```
:::


## Make A Basic Map

We make a basic map, reading it into an object called `mymap.` We then *replay* `mymap.`


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
mymap <- ggplot(mapdata) + # the data I am mapping
  geom_sf() # the geometry I am using

mymap # replay my map
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](cartogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Make And Plot The Cartogram

### Make The Cartogram Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
mapdata_merc <- st_transform(mapdata, 
                             3857) # transform to Mercator (why?)

# make a cartogram
# each iteration takes a LONG time
# fewer iterations help the time
# but each iteration contributes to the 'distortion'
# and makes a more 'cartogram'-like cartogram

start_time <- Sys.time() # time this step

mapdata_cartogram <- cartogram_cont(mapdata_merc, 
                                  "pop_est", 
                                  itermax = 7)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in cartogram_cont.sf(mapdata_merc, "pop_est", itermax = 7): NA not
allowed in weight vector. Features will be removed from Shape.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
end_time <- Sys.time()

end_time - start_time
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Time difference of 3.799309 mins
```


:::
:::


### Basic Cartogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
ggplot(mapdata_cartogram) + 
  geom_sf()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](cartogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


::: {.callout-tip}
### Why Does Antarctica Look So Strange? How To Fix This?

The key is to run this `dplyr` code to remove Antarctica.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
mapdata_cartogram <- mapdata_cartogram %>% 
  dplyr::filter(! continent == "Antarctica")
```
:::

:::

### More Advanced Cartogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true"}
ggplot(mapdata_cartogram) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = pop_est)) + # fill is population estimate
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "population",
                       option = "turbo") + # beautiful colors
  theme_void()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](cartogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
